participant_1.background:
I often find myself getting distracted by social media when I should be working.
I enjoy spending time with my grandparents and hearing about their stories.
My family and I are close because we are all in on the joke.
I can work from home and still make enough money to provide for my family.
My favorite book is a collection of spooky Halloween stories.

participant_2.background:
I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.
I'm a talented singer, but I'm afraid to tell my parents because they might want me to perform in public.
i m fabulous from my on trend haircut to my louis vuittons.
I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
I try to feel younger by spending time with my cat.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
Nothing much. Just hanging out. I'm single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
What kind of art do you do?
I love to sing, but I'm afraid to tell my parents because they might want me to perform in public.
That's a shame. You should share your talent with the world!
I'm not sure if I'm ready for that yet. I'm still trying to figure out who I am and what I want to do with my life.
Well, I'm sure you'll figure it out eventually. In the meantime, keep on singing.
Thanks for the encouragement. I appreciate it.
No problem. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to shop. I'm fabulous from my on trend haircut to my Louis Vuittons.
I'm not much of a shopper myself, but I can appreciate a good outfit.
I'm glad you agree. I think it's important to look good and feel good about yourself.
I know what you mean. I like to dress to impress.
Me too. I think it's a great way to show the world who you are.
I agree. So, what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still trying to figure out what I want to do with my life. But I'm excited to see what the future holds.
Well, I'm sure you'll do great things. You seem like a very talented and driven person.
